suite.name: Amazon Testes

test.name: Caso de Teste 01 - Acesspao menu "Eletronicos"

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
kw.msg: The chromedriver version (116.0.5845.96) detected in PATH at C:\Users\weviton.silva\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python312\Scripts\chromedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (117.0.5938.149); currently, chromedriver 117.0.5938.149 is recommended for chrome 117.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry

Verificar se aparece a categoria "Computadores e Informática"

test.doc: Esse teste verifica o menu eletrônicos do site da amazon.com.br verifica a categoria computadores e Informática
